EmailTemplate.name: When did you issue my 1099-INT?
EmailTemplate.subject: When did you issue my 1099-INT?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The 1099-INT statement was mailed to your current address on file on [Date]. This statement is also available within Online Banking and can be accessed by following these steps
1. Click Additional Services 2. Click eStatements 3. On the left hand side, click on “View Statement History” for the applicable account. 4. Select the earlier dated statement for [date].
We appreciate your business and commit to providing superior Banking products, support and services.
